sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"停留，逗留"之意。
means: remain ： 指某人或某物仍留在原处或保持原来的状态。
linger ： 着重因愉快的事而使人不愿离开。
stay ： 普通用词，多指人在某地暂时逗留。有时可指较长时间的居留。

sentence.Network_en: The price of oil should remain stable for the rest of 1992.
sentence.Network_cn: 油价会在1992年剩下的时间里保持稳定。

sentence.Network_en: It'd be better for a place like this to remain closed.
sentence.Network_cn: 像这种地方最好一直关闭。

sentence.Network_en: The $40 million-a-month aid payments will remain on ice.
sentence.Network_cn: 每月4,000万美元的援助款项将继续搁置下去。

CCNA英文单词总汇 _ CISCO思科认证 _ 考试大 ... Reliable 可靠 Remain 剩余 Remote 远程.

推荐几首英... ... my brain 这幻影在我脑海里种下了根 Still remains 萦绕不去 Within the sound of silence 与于寂静无声的此刻.

jx.jx_en_mean: used to express the notion that something is not yet known or certain

lj.lj_ly: she has broken her leg, but it remains to be seen how badly.
lj.lj_ls: 她把腿摔断了，但有多严重还有待了解。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French remain-, stressed stem of remanoir, from Latin remanere, from re- (expressing intensive force) + manere 'to stay'

entry.def: If someone or something remains in a particular state or condition, they stay in that state or condition and do not change.
If you remain in a place, you stay there and do not move away.

example.ex: He will have to remain in hospital for at least 10 days...
example.tran: 他至少得在医院里呆10天。

example.ex: From time to time, James remained at home with his family.
example.tran: 詹姆斯偶尔留在家里陪家人。

entry.def: You can say that something remains when it still exists.

example.ex: Many of the differences in everyday life remain...
example.tran: 日常生活中的许多差异仍然存在。
更普遍的问题仍未解决。

entry.def: If something remains to be done, it has not yet been done and still needs to be done.

example.ex: Major questions remain to be answered about his work...
example.tran: 关于他工作的许多重要问题仍然悬而未决。

example.ex: Huge amounts of weapons remain to be collected.
example.tran: 大量的武器仍有待收缴。

entry.def: The remains of something are the parts of it that are left after most of it has been taken away or destroyed.

example.ex: They were tidying up the remains of their picnic.
example.tran: 他们正在收拾野餐后剩下的东西。

entry.def: The remains of a person or animal are the parts of their body that are left after they have died, sometimes after they have been dead for a long time.

example.ex: The unrecognizable remains of a man had been found...
example.tran: 一具无法辨认的男性尸体被发现了。

example.ex: More human remains have been unearthed in the north of the country.
example.tran: 在该国北部挖出了更多的人类遗骨。

entry.def: Historical remains are things that have been found from an earlier period of history, usually buried in the ground, for example parts of buildings and pieces of pottery.

example.ex: There are Roman remains all around us.
example.tran: 我们周围都是古罗马的遗迹。

entry.tran: （事实、问题等)仍然是(表示强调)
entry.def: You can use remain in expressions such as the fact remains that or the question remains whether to introduce and emphasize something that you want to talk about.

example.ex: The fact remains that inflation is unacceptably high...
example.tran: 事实是通货膨胀率仍高得离谱。

example.ex: The question remains whether he was fully aware of the claims.
example.tran: 问题是他是否完全意识到了这些要求。

entry.def: If you say that it remains to be seen whether something will happen, you mean that nobody knows whether it will happen.

example.ex: It remains to be seen whether her parliamentary colleagues will agree.
example.tran: 她的国会同僚是否同意，现在还无从知晓。

means.word_mean: 1. stay the same; remain in a certain state;

sentences.sentence: "The dress remained wet after repeated attempts to dry it"
"The bad weather continued for another week"

means.word_mean: 2. continue in a place, position, or situation;

sentences.sentence: "After graduation, she stayed on in Cambridge as a student adviser"
"despite student protests, he remained Dean for another year"
"She continued as deputy mayor for another year"

means.word_mean: 3. be left; of persons, questions, problems, results, evidence, etc.;

sentences.sentence: "There remains the question of who pulled the trigger"
"Carter remains the only President in recent history under whose Presidency the U.S. did not fight a war"
"The hostility remained long after they made up"

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps he wanted to remain anonymous, I thought.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps he wanted to remain anonymous, I thought.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps he wanted to remain anonymous, I thought.

auth_sentence.content: Tory party policy is to remain in the EU.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tory party policy is to remain in the EU.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tory party policy is to remain in the EU.

auth_sentence.content: Elders at Glenarm remain in post and are unaffected.
auth_sentence.res_content: Elders at Glenarm remain in post and are unaffected.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Elders at Glenarm remain in post and are unaffected.

Sentence.sentence: But functioning fireplaces remain to this day a powerful selling point in a house or apartment.

The latest congressional report acknowledges the critical importance of technical training, but also asserts that the study of the humanities (人文学科)and social sciences must remain central components of America's educational system at all levels
And so the old technology remains as a backup.
But the consumer sentiment index remains weak, and all the rebound has occurred in Americans' evaluation of future economic conditions, not the present.
Its informal conversational style would make interaction comfortable, and yet the machine would remain slightly unpredictable and therefore interesting.
Its informal conversational style would make interaction comfortable, and yet the machine would remain slightly unpredictable and therefore interesting.

sentences.en: The remains of the meal were[was]fed to the dog.
His mortal remains are buried in the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 他的遗体埋葬在教堂的墓地里。

means.word_mean: 遗迹, 遗址, 废墟

sentences.en: Here is the remains of a temple.
sentences.cn: 这里是一所寺院的废墟。

sentences.en: They remained there all through the year.
sentences.cn: 他们在那里一直待到了年底。

sentences.en: I remained six days in London.
Though the sore being healed, yet a scar may remain.
sentences.cn: 伤口虽然痊愈, 却可能留下伤疤。

sentences.en: There remained in the village only women and children.
sentences.cn: 村子里只剩下妇女和儿童了。

sentences.en: You can't let the room remain like this.
sentences.cn: 你不能把房间老是弄成这样。

means.word_mean: 保持；继续；仍然处于；依然

sentences.en: I haven't seen them for ten years. They remain as they were.
sentences.cn: 我十年没见他们了，他们还是从前那样。

sentences.en: The honour remained with our motherland.
The decision remains with the Government.
The fact remains that we are still lagging behind the other classes in maths.
sentences.cn: 事实是我们在数学方面仍然比别的班落后。

sentences.en: Peter has become a judge but John remains a fisherman.
sentences.cn: 彼得当了法官, 但约翰仍是个渔民。

sentences.en: He remained firm in the face of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 他在敌人面前始终很坚定。

sentences.en: When I got back home, he remained listening to the radio.
sentences.cn: 我回到家的时候, 他还在听收音机。

sentences.en: Let things remain as they have been in the past.

jushi.english: We have been friendly to each other, we must always remain so.
jushi.chinese: 我们一向友好相处,我们应永远这样。

jushi.english: It remains below 13℃ for about five months of the year.
jushi.chinese: 一年约有五个月它的温度保持在摄氏13度以下。

jushi.english: We all wish you to remain for dinner.
jushi.chinese: 我们都希望你能留下来吃饭。
